price: They are those who trade guidance for misguidance and forgiveness for punishment. How patient they must be to withstand the Fire[77]!
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱشۡتَرَوُاْ ٱلضَّلَٰلَةَ بِٱلۡهُدَىٰ وَٱلۡعَذَابَ بِٱلۡمَغۡفِرَةِۚ فَمَآ أَصۡبَرَهُمۡ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ
footnotes: [77] Allah is mocking their ignorance for exchanging bliss of Paradise with punishment of Hellfire.
